name: Finding Yourself (AG)
description:
CONTROLS:

Move -> WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump -> Spacebar

Marquese... wake up... your arms and legs were blown off in a giant and unexpected explosion. Remember? You've found yourself deep in a cave below your home... you need to find your arms and legs (and your coins from your wallet that got destroyed) and return home... Marquese... can you hear me...? You still have your ears, right?

For this game I made most of the pixel art myself.

Here's the rest of the resource attributes I used:

Music: Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

SFX: Kyjor

Skeletons: jhanson9012
